description: This CSS file manages theme-related styles, specifically light and dark theme colors, and provides styles for components such as the app's header, logo, links, and a theme toggle button.

classes.description: Styling for the application header component.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application.

classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button.

classes.description: Styling for the navbar menu panel.
